person.aboutMe: I am a punctual and motivated individual who is able to work in a busy environment and produce high standards of work. I am an excellent team worker and am able to take instructions from all levels and build up good working relationships with all colleagues. I am flexible, reliable and possess excellent time keeping skills.
person.contactDesc: Thank you for taking time to visit my portfolio and really appreciate being considered for the position. If you have any additional questions or require further clarification, please, do not hesitate to call me or send me an email.

education.degree: Certificate of course completion, Java Spring
education.majorSubjects: Major Subjects: JavaSE | Hibernet | Spring | PostgreSQL
Major Subjects: Object Orinted Programming | Software Engineering | PHP | C# | MySQL

jobDesc.jobText: Work with business Analyst to help create all documentation.
Provide training to other developers as well as lead workshops and knowledge transfer.
Manage own workload, accurately estimate effort for tasks.
Provides technical expertise to the development team and business analysts.
Develop, test, and document SAP Reports, Interfaces, Conversions, Enhancements and Forms.
Working closely with the SAP Basis team to monitor, test and tune application components for optimized performance and integration.
Recognize the critical elements of complex application problems, develop and evaluate data, determine solutions, and make logical recommendations.
Work with the team to develop and test functionality that meets documented design.
Involved in developing server pages using Servlets and JSP.
